variables.input:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(event.type) or isNull(object.id)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(event.provider)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(event.type) or isNull(object.id)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(object.type)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else: "None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(event.type) or isNull(object.id)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(event.type)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else: "None")

1.content:
# Security product coverage

Overview of the security product coverage by various covered objects and entities. Learn more about [Security events ingest](https://dt-url.net/1d63p0v).

19.content:
## Coverage overview
Distribution of security findings by reporting products and the corresponding affected object types.

30.title: Security events per top 10 products

31.title: Ingested finding events over time

32.title: Scan events
32.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND in(event.type,{"VULNERABILITY_SCAN","COMPLIANCE_SCAN"})
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(object.id)
// filter with the dashboard variables
| filter (in(event.provider, $Product))
     AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
     AND (in(event.type,$EventType))
// get the latest vulnerability finding report for the affected entity and the component of the repository in the registry
| summarize count()

33.title: Reporting products
33.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(event.type) or isNull(object.id)
// filter with the dashboard variables
| filter (in(event.provider, $Product))
     AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
     AND (in(event.type,$EventType))
// get the latest vulnerability finding report for the affected entity and the component of the repository in the registry
| summarize Products=countDistinctExact(event.provider)

34.title: Ingested scan events over time

35.title: Finding events
35.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
         AND in(event.type,{"VULNERABILITY_FINDING","DETECTION_FINDING","COMPLIANCE_FINDING"})
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(object.id) or isNull(finding.id)
// filter with the dashboard variables
| filter (in(event.provider, $Product))
     AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
     AND (in(event.type,$EventType))
// get the latest vulnerability finding report for the affected entity and the component of the repository in the registry
| summarize count()

47.content:
### Latest 50 security events
Recently ingested security events.

48.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
| filter event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
// filter for events fitting the SD requirements
| filterOut isNull(event.type) or isNull(object.id)
// filter with the dashboard variables
| filter (in(event.provider, $Product))
     AND (in(object.type, $AffectedObjectType))
     AND (in(event.type,$EventType))
// aggregation and custom filtering
| fieldsAdd object.name=coalesce(object.name, object.id)
| fields timestamp, Time=timestamp, `Source product`=event.provider, 
        `Event type`=event.type, `Object type`=object.type, `Affected object`=object.name
| sort {timestamp, direction:"descending"}
| fieldsRemove timestamp
| limit 50
